title: Morning Joe 8/30/21
description: Hurricane Ida weakened to a tropical storm Monday after crashing into Louisiana and knocking out power to more than 1 million homes and businesses including the city of New Orleans.
author: news.podcasts@nbcuni.com (NBC News)
